interestingcomments.content: Hi to everybody out there! After dropping into this new forum few days ago I've forgotten to introduce myself, sorry for this. My name is Bernd, I'm living near Dusseldorf/Rhine I'm taking photographs since the age of 13. I'm now 58, next year I go into retirement. 35 years ago my first real slr was a Nikon F Photomic, fitted with a Nikkor 50/f2 and a Soligor 28/2,8. Today I know the expression Street Photography but at that time it was for me just like walking around and catching moments. After a big break I started again this spring with street/people always afraid that I have lost this 'eye'. If you like, pls. look here my old pics of a young guy which is now much older but not wiser ;- Thanks Bernd --img--
